body:
This is the best S&M doujin I've ever read! And for an S&M this was unexpectedly really wholesome, well tbh his works in general are wholesome but this is the most wholesome S&M doujin I've ever read. You know someone's got a lot of experience on BDSM if their works also include the aftercare, and this doujin has the best climax and aftercare I've ever read. It was really serious, but also really wholesome and touching. 11/10, definitely the S&M doujin that I love the most for now. I hope they will be back soon tho...
(oh and for those who want translation you can read it on MSM Vol. 1, it's in Japanese but you can use an app called Kanji Study to search for kanji you don't know. I read it this way too, and it was a really great experience since I can imagine the characters' voices in my head :D)

poster.username: K I R I T O D
